00022 void StaticEntity::draw(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00023 {

00025   m_mesh->draw();

00028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 void StaticEntity::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00030 {
00031   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00032       (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00033 
00034   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00035   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00036   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00037   ngl::Mat4 M;
00038   ngl::Transformation trans;
00039 
00040   if(m_obstacleType == obstacleTree)
00041   {
00042     ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00043     m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00044     m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(0.0,0.5,0.0,1.0));
00045 
00046     m.loadToShader("material");
00047 
00048     trans.setPosition(m_pos);
00049     trans.setRotation(m_dir);
00050   }
00051   else if(m_obstacleType == obstacleStreetLight)
00052   {
00053     ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00054     m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00055     m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(0.6,0.6,0.6,1.0));
00056 
00057     m.loadToShader("material");
00058 
00059     trans.setPosition(m_pos);
00060     trans.setRotation(m_dir);
00061   }
00062 
00063 
00064   M=trans.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00065   MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00066   MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00067   normalMatrix=MV;
00068   normalMatrix.inverse();
00069   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MV",MV);
00070   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00071   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00072   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("M",M);
00073 }
